contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|drift}} :'''Drift''' may mean: {{tocright}} == Film and literature == * [[Drift (Doctor Who)|''Drift'' (Doctor Who)]], a 2002 ''Doctor Who'' novel * [[Drift (film series)|''Drift'' (film series)]], a series of Japanese films written and directed by Futoshi Jinno * Drift, 2007 experimental short film by [[Max Hattler]] * [[Drift (Transformers)]], a fictional character * [[Drift (2012 film)|''Drift'' (2012 film)]], an Australian movie starring [[Sam Worthington]] * ''[[Drift: The Unmooring of American Military Power]]'', a book by MSNBC host Rachel Maddow == Geography == * [[Battle of Rorke's Drift]], 1879 battle between British and Zulu forces * [[Drift, Cornwall]], a village * [[Drift Reservoir]], near Drift, Cornwall * [[Velddrif]], a town on the west coast Bergrivier Local Municipality * [[Drift, Kentucky]] == Industry == * [[Drift pin]], a metalworking tool used to align parts * [[Drift mining]], a nearly horizontal underground tunnel * [[Drift netting]], a fishing technique where nets, called drift nets, are allowed to drift free in a sea or lake * [[Pipe drift]], eccentricity or roundness in a pipe's inner wall == Music == * [[Drift (Flotsam and Jetsam album)|''Drift'' (Flotsam and Jetsam album)]], 1995 * ''[[The Drift]]'', 2006 album by Scott Walker * [[Drift (Ken Block album)|''Drift'' (Ken Block album)]], 2008 * [[Drift (Nosaj Thing album)|''Drift'' (Nosaj Thing album)]], 2009 * [[Drift (Emily Osment song)|"Drift" (Emily Osment song)]], 2011 == Science == * [[Clock drift]] * [[Directional Recoil Identification From Tracks]], a dark matter experiment * [[Drift (geology)]] * [[Continental drift]] * [[Drift velocity]] * [[Genetic drift]], mechanism of evolution * [[Stochastic drift]], the average change over time in a random process * [[Drift (linguistics)]], a unidirectional short-term and cyclic long-term drift * [[Drift (telecommunication)]], a comparatively long-term change in an attribute, value, or operational parameter of a system or equipment * [[Diffuse reflectance infrared fourier transform]], a technique for spectra collection ==See also== * [[Drifting (disambiguation)]] * [[Drifter (disambiguation)]] * [[Driftwood]] * [[Daventry International Railfreight Terminal]] (DIRFT), in England * [[DÃ©rive]], the spontaneous exploration of urban landscapes guided by aesthetic instinct {{disambiguation}}
